item.title: Vance arrives in India, to hold talks with Modi under U.S. tariffs shadow
item.description: U.S. Vice President JD Vance began a four-day visit to India and will hold talks with Prime Minister Narendra Modi, as New Delhi rushes to avoid steep...

item.title: 'A man of the people': World leaders react to the death of Pope Francis
item.description: Tributes and condolences poured in from around the world following news of the death of Pope Francis, who passed away on Monday at the age of 88.

item.title: Vance set to visit India for bilateral talks on economic, trade and geopolitical ties
item.description: U.S. Vice President JD Vance will embark on a four-day visit to India on Monday as the two countries seek to unlock economic opportunities.
